title: A Rope Delay Paint Shells for A Main
description: Here's a simple Paint Shells lineup to delay the attacker's push into A Main, giving your teammates time to rotate to defend Site.

title: How to Fight For Link Control With Boom Bot
description: Fight for Link Control with this Boom Bot, as it targets any Defenders playing towards spawn. You'll be able to isolate fights easier with this Boom Bot.

title: How to Execute A Site With Boom Bot From Art
description: Combo your utility like so, for a strong execute towards the A Site. Your Boom Bot will target any Defenders back site, and your Paint Shells will flush any sitting Dug Out.

title: Start Round Paint Shells to Market From Art
description: Here's a simple, but effective Paint Shells lineup you can use to harass Attackers pushing from Market. Combo this utility with your teammates for an early round kill.

title: Boombot / Paintshells Setup to Hold Mid Doors / Gather Info Mid
description: Delay, info denial, and info gathering are all key concepts to keep in mind when holding Mid Doors. This setup opens up many opportunities to apply all three of those concepts, if used at an ideal time in the round.

title: B Site Hold Paint Shells / Blast Pack Delay Setup
description: Here's a simple, but effective B Site Hold setup that delays the enemy team's push onto the Site.

title: B Main Execute Boom Bot Lineup into B Site
description: Use this Boom Bot lineup to execute onto B Site through with your team.

title: A Main Paint Shells + Fade Seize Combo
description: Use this early round A Main Paint Shells + Seize combo to get picks early in the round by catching enemy players who attempt to push through A Main quickly off guard, while also creating a window of opportunity that your team can use to gain an advantage when contesting A Main.

title: Delay C Site Push with These Paint Shells Lineups when Rotating
description: Use these Paint Shells lineups to delay the C Site Push when you are rotating through C Waterfall or C Hall from somewhere else on the map.

title: Early Round A Main Paint Shells to Contest Space
description: Throw Paint Shells in front of the Attacker A Lobby spawn barrier to contest space in A Main.

title: Wall + Orb for A Site Execute From A Long
description: Enable your team to successfully take the A Site with this strong combination of Viper utility, the orb is great for isolating Defenders trying to coordinate a retake.

title: Wall + Orb for B Site Execute From Outside Window
description: This combination of Viper utility covers both A Link and C Link, and can be used aggressively to take one of the links while the other is smoked off.

title: Spawn to B Site Post Plant Snakebite
description: Here's a great, safe molly lineup you can use from spawn in the post plant situation. You can make micro-adjustments to the lineup to land on the right plant spot, this one covers the left corner.

title: A Long Snakebite Post Plant to A Site
description: Here's a fast and simple molly lineup you can use during the post plant, you will not be exposed to any Defenders retaking long.

title: A Long to A Site Post Plant Snakebite
description: A good snakebite to prevent the enemies from defusing the bomb while you tick down the timer.

title: C Long to C Site Toxic Screen
description: This wall is useful for aggressively pushing onto C Site. You mostly have to worry about defending in the back of C, but you completely block off the rotations from defender spawn and garage.

title: C Site to C Link One Way Smoke
description: One way smoke to help defend against site retakes from CT

title: Grass to B Site Snakebite
description: A good snakebite to prevent the enemies from defusing the bomb while you tick down the timer.

title: Aggressive C Link Orb to Mid Window
description: Delay your throw a little later than your jump to successfully accomplish this aggressive orb lineup.

title: Start Round Garage Door One Way Poison Cloud
description: As soon as preparation phase is completed, throw your orb like so for an easy garage hold.

title: Standard Defender Wall for A Site and B Site
description: Use this simple, yet effective wall to cover the chokepoints of both A Site and B Site.

title: A Long One Way Poison Orb for A Site
description: Use this strong one way lineup to isolate A Long Attackers and A Short Attackers from executing easily.

title: A Site Ramp to B Site Toxic Screen
description: A good toxic screen to defend both entrances to A and also defend the entrance to B while only physically being on one site.

title: C Site to B Site Toxic Screen
description: A good toxic screen to defend both C Site and B Site while physically being on one site.

title: C Site To C Long One Way Smoke
description: This one way smoke is great for holding the C Long angle and makes it impossible for the enemies to contest you.

title: Wall + Orb for Rafters B Site Execute
description: Enable your team with this combination of Viper utility, as it blocks off any B Heaven player's field of vision.

title: Standard B Site Default Orb From Market
description: Here's a strong default orb you can throw at the start of the round to pressure any B Site Defender, as you threaten a lurk or shooting B Heaven players from the side.

title: Market to B Default Post Plant Snakebite
description: Here's a simple post plant molly lineup you can throw to prevent Defenders from defusing at B Default.

title: A Side Attacker Default Wall to A Heaven
description: Here's a powerful wall you can throw at the start of the round to pressure any Defenders that are playing towards A. Essentially, this enforces Defenders to worry about A Heaven.

title: A Site Toxic Screen + Poison Orb Execute Setup
description: This Toxic Screen + Poison Orb combo blocks sightlines of Defenders through A Tower and A Screens, which are crucial sightlines to block during most of the common A Site Executes, alongside blocking vision of Defenders into A Main from A Ramps.

title: Start Round Orb From Screens to A Main
description: Use this orb lineup a little bit before the barrier drops for a standard smoke at A Main.

title: Aggressive Defender Ropes Wall to Mid
description: Here's a wall you can throw during preparation phase to aggressively fight for mid control. This wall allows both Mail and Ropes players to coordinate and fight together.

title: Early Round Defender Mail Pit to Mid
description: Here's a solid start round Viper ultimate you can use to effectively lockdown Mid.

title: Start Round One Way Orb For Mail
description: Throw your orb when the barrier drops like so, for a strong one way that prevents any Attackers from taking B Heaven control easily.

title: Start Round One Way Orb For B Main
description: Throw your orb when the barrier drops like so, for a powerful one way at B Main. This is more effective when you are on top of the small barrels back site.

title: Standard Defender Wall for Mid and A
description: Throw this wall during preparation phase for a solid default wall that blocks A Main, Ramp, and Mid.

title: B Main + Mid Top Toxic Screen
description: Here's a Toxic screen that can delay / make it more difficult for Attackers to push through both Mid, as well as B Main.

title: Hut to B Site Post Plant Snakebite
description: Here's a simple post plant molly lineup that is safe, as it lets you play outside of B Main.

title: Start Round Tiles to Mid Poison Cloud
description: Use this start round lineup to ensure easier control of mid. This orb is great for defaulting, as you get to choose when it goes up or down. You can use it to take mid control, or cross from tiles to cat.

title: Standard Orb + Wall Combo For B Site Execute
description: Here's a standard smoke setup for the B Site, as your wall covers market and orb for spawn. Be careful though, Defenders can potentially hide and tuck in the corner of B Main. On the mini-map, in the video, the danger ping highlights the aforementioned spot.
